function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Utilizing big data and technology may lead to privacy and data security risks, especially in the context of a pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying heavily on digital solutions may exacerbate the digital divide and marginalize vulnerable populations who lack access to technology.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The rapid deployment of technology without proper testing and validation may lead to errors in decision-making and resource allocation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digitized information for pandemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of drones for mobility and surveillance actions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density in urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital tooling for data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-notification of cases may lead to distorted results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographic distribution may contribute to contagion in densely populated areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low technology adoption in certain regions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital exclusion in underprivileged regions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of digital tools for healthcare support","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transposition of activities to virtual platforms may not optimize public administration activities, but only digitize processes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Simple replacement of physical activities with digital processes may be a shallow level of technological impact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on telephone exchange as a communication strategy may be anachronistic compared to digital devices.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of smartphones for monitoring urban agglomerations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digital tools as educational support","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virtual strategies in the area of health and support to the hospital system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cities known for adopting technology and innovation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pre-existing infrastructure in cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of wealth and resources leading to socioeconomic disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of digital tools in areas with higher socioeconomic development","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of digital initiatives for health and education support","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity between health support strategies and cities with better history of adopting digital tools","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High incidence of results in education support reflecting the need for alternative school arrangements","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of predictability in the distribution of digital initiatives for health and education support","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty in impact assessment and cause-and-effect relationship","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dual challenge of anticipating demands and responding to emergencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tendency to apply digital strategies in contexts with higher gdp per capita or history of digital instrumentation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unilateral view of technology as the last solution for demands in cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Evolution of digital tooling and crisis-induced learning raising awareness about the role of technology in the urban environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dissemination of covid-19 cases shown on the map","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adoption of digital tooling in municipalities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"City awarded in technology and innovation axis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct and indirect spread of the covid-19 infection through respiratory droplets and fecal-oral routes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within healthcare and non-healthcare facilities, leading to infections and deaths among healthcare workers and others.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overwhelming health systems in resource-limited settings due to the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear source and intermediate hosts of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease transmission from person-to-person","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic carriers as potential source of virus spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus survival on various surfaces and at low temperatures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modes of virus transmission including direct and indirect contact, respiratory droplets, and fecal-oral route","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clinical features and high-risk groups for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long incubation period of up to 27 days increases the risk of asymptomatic transmission and delayed detection.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workplace classification of high-risk groups poses a significant risk of transmission and infection for employees in these settings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher fatality rates among older and immunocompromised individuals pose a significant risk to these population groups.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 from person to person","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher occurrence and fatalities in certain countries","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
